metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17433 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The recv_files function in receiver.c in the daemon in rsync 3.1.2, and 3.1.3-development before 2017-12-03, proceeds with certain file metadata updates before checking for a filename in the daemon_filter_list data structure, which allows remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17433` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

rsync - 3.1.1-3ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rsync package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.1-3ubuntu1.1').
